President Trump: s tweet on June 23, 2017, where he claimed to have signed 38 legislative bills, mostly without Democratic support, and removed significant amounts of regulations.
Confirmation that Trump: s claim about the number of bills signed was accurate, but the fact that many of these bills did not result in substantive legislative change.
Mention of California Rep: Devin Nunes' claim on Fresno's KMJ radio that Trump had signed more bills into law at that stage than any previous president, which was made on June 19, 2017.
Comparison of Trump: s bill signings to previous presidents, specifically California Rep. Tom McClintock's statement that Trump had passed more legislation in his first 100 days than any president since Harry Truman, which was rated as Mostly True.
